album.title: The Heavyweight Champion: The Complete Atlantic Recordings (disc 2)

wiki.content:
John Coltrane - tenor sax
 Tommy Flanagan - piano
 Paul Chambers - bass
 Art Taylor - drums
 
 Written by John Coltrane
 Recorded May 5, 1959 at Atlantic Studios, New York
 Originally released on the album Giant Steps, Atlantic SD-1311, January 1960

 Originally released on the album Giant Steps, Atlantic SD-1311, January 1960

name: Mr. P.c.
comments: tonally uninhibited improvisation Coltrane allowed subsequent generations of musicians consider him one of the pioneers of free jazz
